title: Insta360 X5 360 Camera Updated: Film Your Ride Like You’ve Got a Drone
content:
360 cameras make a lot of sense on a bike and the Insta360 X5 is an updated version with features that make sharing your rides easier.

Read the full article at Insta360 X5 360 Camera Updated: Film Your Ride Like You’ve Got a Drone on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
